#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
#define tr(c,i) for(auto i=(c).begin(); i != (c).end(); i++)
#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0;i<(n);i++)
int tcs, tc;

ll nc2(ll n) {
	return n * (n-1) / 2;
}

ll n, t;
map<ll, ll> m;

int main () {
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin >> n;
	rep (i, n) {
		cin >> t;
		m[t]++;
	}
	ll ans = nc2(n);
	tr (m, i)
		ans -= nc2(i->second);
	cout << ans;
	return 0;
}
